args: Is this article primarily about a new action or announcement by the Trump administration/White House/Executive? Respond simply with "yes" or "no" . Justice Department revokes job offers to young lawyers in elite honors program The Justice Department has abruptly revoked recent job offers from the Attorney General’s Honors Program — a prestigious and competitive opportunity for top law school graduates to work in entry-level positions across the department. The Trump administration’s cancellation of the program was confirmed by people familiar with the decision, who spoke on the condition of anonymity because they were not authorized to discuss it.
